TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PrintDocument extends System.ComponentModel.Component

summary.span: 从 Windows 窗体应用程序打印时，定义一种可重用的可发送到打印机上的对象。

span.span: Defines a reusable object that sends output to a printer, when printing from a Windows Forms application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，创建的实例类中，设置属性，如并，并调用方法开始打印进程。Typically, you create an instance of the class, set properties such as the and , and call the method to start the printing process. 通过使用 的 属性处理 事件，您在该事件中指定要打印的输出。Handle the event where you specify the output to print, by using the property of the . 有关从 Windows 窗体应用程序进行打印的详细信息，请参阅[Windows 窗体打印支持](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/windows-forms-print-support.md)。For more information about printing from a Windows Form application, see the [Windows Forms Print Support](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/windows-forms-print-support.md). 如果你想要从 Windows Presentation Foundation 应用程序打印，请参阅命名空间。If you wish to print from a Windows Presentation Foundation application, see the namespace. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将打印名 C:\My Documents\MyFile.txt 为默认打印机上的文件。The following code example prints the file named C:\My Documents\MyFile.txt on the default printer. 若要运行该示例，创建一个新的 Windows 窗体项目并将示例代码粘贴到窗体中，替换文件内容。To run the example, create a new Windows Forms project and paste the example code into the form, replacing the file contents. 对于 C# 中，需要删除的 Form1.Designer.cs 文件。For C#, you will need to delete the Form1.Designer.cs file. 此外，更改想要打印的文件的路径。Also, change the path to the file you want to print. > [!NOTE] > 该示例需要每个行适合页面宽度。The example requires that each line fits within the page width. 使用， ， ， ，和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the , , , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

related.span: 如何：打印 Windows 窗体中的多页文本文件

span.span: How to: Print a Multi-Page Text File in Windows Forms

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认构造函数初始化基于默认打印机的所有字段。The default constructor initializes all fields based upon the default printer. 通常情况下，在创建一个新，设置会影响通过输出的打印机和页面设置和属性，分别。Typically, after creating a new , you set printer and page settings that affect the output through the and properties, respectively. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置文档的页面方向为横向，并打印该文档。The following code example sets a document's page orientation to landscape, and prints the document. 使用， ，和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event BeginPrint As PrintEventHandler

summary.span: 在调用 方法之后、打印文档首页之前发生。

span.span: Occurs when the method is called and before the first page of the document prints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，处理事件来初始化字体、 文件流，以及在打印过程中使用其他资源。Typically, you handle the event to initialize fonts, file streams, and other resources used during the printing process. 若要将事件与事件处理程序相关联，请添加一个委托给该事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 每次事件发生时调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 使用委托中处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Printing::PageSettings ^ DefaultPageSettings { System::Drawing::Printing::PageSettings ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Printing::PageSettings ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用作要打印的所有页的默认设置的页设置。

span.span: Gets or sets page settings that are used as defaults for all pages to be printed.

value.span: 为文档指定默认页设置的 。

span.span: A that specifies the default page settings for the document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以指定多个默认页设置通过属性。You can specify several default page settings through the property. 例如，属性指定的颜色，是否打印页面属性指定横向或纵向方向和属性指定的页的边距。For example, the property specifies whether the page prints in color, the property specifies landscape or portrait orientation, and the property specifies the margins of the page. 若要按页按指定设置，请处理或事件和修改参数中包含或分别。To specify settings on a page-by-page basis, handle the or event and modify the argument included in the or , respectively. > [!NOTE] > 打印已开始后，更改通过的页设置为属性将不会影响正在打印的页。After printing has started, changes to page settings through the property will not affect pages being printed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置文档的页面方向为横向，并打印该文档。The following code example sets a document's page orientation to landscape, and prints the document. 示例有三个假定： 变量名为`filePath`已设置为文件的路径以打印; 方法名为`pd_PrintPage`，哪些句柄事件，已定义; 并将变量命名为`printer`已设置为打印机的名称。The example makes three assumptions: that a variable named `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print; that a method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined; and that a variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 使用， ，和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument.PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintDocument Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument.PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintDocument Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument.PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintDocument Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置打印文档时要显示的文档名称（例如，在打印状态对话框或打印机队列中）。

span.span: Gets or sets the document name to display (for example, in a print status dialog box or printer queue) while printing the document.

value.span: 打印文档时要显示的文档名。

span.span: The document name to display while printing the document.
The default is "document".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性未指定要打印的文件。The property does not specify the file to print. 相反，指定要处理的打印输出事件。Rather, you specify the output to print by handling the event. 有关示例，请参阅类概述。For an example, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的代码示例打印成彩色、 的第一页文档，如果打印机支持此功能，并设置为用户友好名称。The following code example prints a document with the first page in color, if the printer supports it, and sets the to a user-friendly name. 该示例需要名为变量`printDoc`已创建，并和处理事件。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` has been created, and the and events are handled. 使用和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event EndPrint As PrintEventHandler

summary.span: 打印完文档的最后一页时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the last page of the document has printed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，处理事件以释放字体、 文件流和其他资源在打印过程中，使用喜欢的字体。Typically, you handle the event to release fonts, file streams, and other resources used during the printing process, like fonts. 指示没有更多的页面设置打印属性设置为`false`中事件。You indicate that there are no more pages to print by setting the property to `false` in the event. 如果打印进程被取消，或者在打印过程中发生异常，也会发生事件。The event also occurs if the printing process is canceled or an exception occurs during the printing process. 若要将事件与事件处理程序相关联，请添加一个委托给该事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 每次事件发生时调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 使用委托中处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnBeginPrint(class System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnBeginPrint (e As PrintEventArgs)
abstract member OnBeginPrint : System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs -> unit override this.OnBeginPrint : System.Drawing.Printing.PrintEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

summary.span: 该事件在调用 方法之后并在打印文档的第一页之前被调用。

span.span: It is called after the method is called and before the first page of the document prints.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法允许派生的类进行处理的事件，而无需附加委托。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 当在派生的类调用方法，它会发出通过调用通过委托的事件处理程序的事件。When a derived class calls the method, it raises the event by invoking the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

para.span: 此方法是初始化的适当位置。

span.span: This method is a good place for initialization.

Protected Overridable Sub OnEndPrint (e As PrintEventArgs)

span.span: It is called when the last page of the document has printed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法允许派生的类进行处理的事件，而无需附加委托。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 如果取消打印进程或在打印过程中发生异常，也会调用方法。The method is also called if the printing process is canceled or an exception occurs during the printing process. 当在派生的类调用方法，它会发出通过调用通过委托的事件处理程序的事件。When a derived class calls the method, it raises the event by invoking the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

para.span: 此方法是取消初始化的适当位置。

span.span: This method is a good place for uninitialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法允许派生的类进行处理的事件，而无需附加委托。The method allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 当在派生的类调用方法，它会发出通过调用通过委托的事件处理程序的事件。When a derived class calls the method, it raises the event by invoking the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 当在派生的类调用方法，它会发出通过调用通过委托的事件处理程序的事件。When a derived class calls the method, it raises the event by invoking the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与页关联的图形对象的位置是位于用户指定边距内，还是位于该页可打印区域的左上角。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the position of a graphics object associated with a page is located just inside the user-specified margins or at the top-left corner of the printable area of the page.

value.span: 如果图形起始于页面边距，则为 ；如果图形原点位于该页可打印区域的左上角，则为 。

span.span: if the graphics origin starts at the page margins; if the graphics origin is at the top-left corner of the printable page.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 计算可用于打印的区域需要了解本文中，页的边距的物理大小和位置对象源。Calculating the area available to print requires knowing the physical size of the paper, the margins for the page, and the location of the object origin. 当是`true`，则对象位置会考虑属性值和页面的可打印区域。When is `true`, the object location takes into account the property value and the printable area of the page. 当是`false`，页面可打印区域用于确定的位置对象源，值将被忽略。When is `false`, only the printable area of the page is used to determine the location of the object origin, the value is ignored. 例如，如果是`true`，并每一侧，设置为 1 英寸中包含对象于左侧和顶部的页位于 1 英寸。For example, if is `true`, and is set for 1 inch on each side, the object included in the is located 1 inch from the left and top of the page. 如果页面的可打印区域的每一侧英寸.25 并是`false`，则对象是位于的.25 英寸开始于左侧和页的顶部。If the printable area of the page is .25 of an inch on each side and is `false`, the object is located .25 of an inch from the left and top of the page. > [!NOTE] > 页面的可打印区域因打印机而异，并不保证一定对称。The printable area of a page varies from printer to printer and is not guaranteed to be symmetrical.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Print() cil managed

summary.span: 开始文档的打印进程。

span.span: Starts the document's printing process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定要处理的打印输出事件和通过使用纳入。Specify the output to print by handling the event and by using the included in the . 使用属性来指定哪个打印机来打印文档。Use the property to specify which printer should print the document. 方法将文档打印而无需使用打印对话框。The method prints the document without using a print dialog. 使用当你想要使用户能够选择打印设置。Use a when you want to offer the user the ability to choose print settings. > [!NOTE] > 如果未处理的异常方法引发在打印期间，文档的打印会中止。If an exception that is not handled by the method is thrown during printing, the printing of the document is aborted. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将打印到默认打印机命令行通过指定的文件。The following code example prints the file that is specified through the command line to the default printer. > [!NOTE] > 该示例需要每个行适合页面宽度。The example requires that each line fits within the page width. 使用， ， ， ，和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the , , , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument.PrintPage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintPage Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument.PrintPage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintPage Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument.PrintPage Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintPage Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

exception.span: 属性中命名的打印机不存在。

span.span: The printer named in the property does not exist.

permission.span: 用于从受限制的对话框的安全打印。

span.span: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Printing::PrintController ^ PrintController { System::Drawing::Printing::PrintController ^ get(); void set(System::Drawing::Printing::PrintController ^ value); };
member this.PrintController : System.Drawing.Printing.PrintController with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置指导打印进程的打印控制器。

span.span: Gets or sets the print controller that guides the printing process.
The that guides the printing process.

value.span: 默认情况下为 类的一个新实例。

span.span: The default is a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个打印控制器指导打印进程几种方式。A print controller guides the printing process in several ways. 例如，若要打印文档时，需要将其转换为对象。For example, to print a document, you need to convert it to a object. 一个指定为打印预览或实际打印文档的打印机上的图像中绘制图形的位置。A specifies where to draw the graphic in an image for a print preview or on a printer to actually print the document. 一个打印控制器还可以指定是否要立即打印文档或等待指定的时间间隔。A print controller can also specify whether to print a document immediately, or wait a specified interval. ## Examples 下面的代码示例要求您创建的实例名为类`myPrintDocument`。The following code example requires that you have created an instance of the class that is named `myPrintDocument`. 该示例创建的新实例类中，将它分配给属性的`myPrintDocument`，并打印该文档。The example creates a new instance of the class, assigns it to the property of `myPrintDocument`, and prints the document. 使用和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument.PrintController Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintController Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument.PrintController Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintController Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument.PrintController Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrintController Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

permission.span: 用于从受限制的对话框的安全打印。

span.span: for safe printing from a restricted dialog box.

summary.span: 获取或设置对文档进行打印的打印机。

span.span: Gets or sets the printer that prints the document.

value.span: ，它指定在何处以及如何打印文档。

span.span: A that specifies where and how the document is printed.

value.span: 默认为 ，其属性均设置为默认值。

span.span: The default is a with its properties set to their default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以指定多个打印机设置通过属性。You can specify several printer settings through the property. 例如，使用属性来指定你想要打印的份数属性来指定要使用的打印机和属性来指定您想要打印的页范围。For example, use the property to specify the number of copies you want to print, the property to specify the printer to use, and the property to specify the range of pages you want to print. ## Examples 下面的代码示例指定打印机上打印文档。The following code example prints a document on the specified printer. 示例有三个假定： 的变量名称`filePath`已设置为文件的路径以打印; 方法名为`pd_PrintPage`，哪个句柄事件，已定义; 并将变量命名为`printer`已设置为打印机的名称。The example makes three assumptions: that a variable names `filePath` has been set to the path of the file to print; that a method named `pd_PrintPage`, which handles the event, has been defined; and that a variable named `printer` has been set to the printer's name. 使用， ，和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument.PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrinterSettings Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument.PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrinterSettings Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument.PrinterSettings Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument.PrinterSettings Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event PrintPage As PrintPageEventHandler

summary.span: 当需要为当前页打印的输出时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the output to print for the current page is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要指定要打印的输出，请使用 的 属性。To specify the output to print, use the property of the . 例如，若要指定应打印文本行，绘制文本使用方法。For example, to specify a line of text that should be printed, draw the text using the method. 除了指定输出，您可以指示是否有其他页面设置打印属性设置为`true`。In addition to specifying the output, you can indicate if there are additional pages to print by setting the property to `true`. 默认值是`false`，这表示是更多要打印的页。The default is `false`, which indicates that there are no more pages to print. 此外可以通过修改单独的页设置，并且可以通过设置取消打印作业属性设置为`true`。Individual page settings can also be modified through the and the print job can be canceled by setting the property to `true`. 若要使用不同的页设置的文档每一页打印，处理事件。To print each page of a document using different page settings, handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理程序相关联，请添加一个委托给该事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 每次事件发生时调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 使用委托中处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何处理事件。The following code example demonstrates handling the event. 有关其他示例，请参阅[如何： 打印 Windows 窗体中的多页文本文件](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-print-a-multi-page-text-file-in-windows-forms.md)。For another example, see [How to: Print a Multi-Page Text File in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/advanced/how-to-print-a-multi-page-text-file-in-windows-forms.md). 使用， ，和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the , , and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic PrintDocument Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic PrintDocument Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

related.span: 如何：打印 Windows 窗体中的多页文本文件

span.span: How to: Print a Multi-Page Text File in Windows Forms
Windows Forms Print Support

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event QueryPageSettings As QueryPageSettingsEventHandler

summary.span: 在 事件的紧面前发生。

span.span: Occurs immediately before each event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就可以打印使用不同的页设置的文档的每一页。It is possible to print each page of a document using different page settings. 通过修改各个属性的设置页设置属性或通过将属性设置为。You set page settings by modifying individual properties of the property or by setting the property to a . 对所做更改影响仅在当前页，不文档的默认页设置。Changes made to the affect only the current page, not the document's default page settings. 此外可以通过设置取消打印作业属性设置为`true`为。The print job can also be canceled by setting the property to `true` for the . 若要将事件与事件处理程序相关联，请添加一个委托给该事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 每次事件发生时调用事件处理程序。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs. 使用委托中处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events with delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 如果您使用要修改的打印机设置的性能事件控件不会提高，即使设置优化配置开关。If you use the event to modify printer settings, the performance of the control will not improve even if an optimization configuration switch is set. 有关详细信息，请参阅[PrintPreviewDialog 控件概述](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/printpreviewdialog-control-overview-windows-forms.md)。For more information, see [PrintPreviewDialog control overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/printpreviewdialog-control-overview-windows-forms.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例打印成彩色、 的第一页文档若打印机支持它。The following code example prints a document with the first page in color, if the printer supports it. 该示例需要名为变量`printDoc`已创建，并和处理事件。The example requires that a variable named `printDoc` has been created, and the and events are handled. `currentPageNumber`变量递增后的每一页打印中事件，而不会显示。The `currentPageNumber` variable is incremented after every page is printed in the event, which is not shown. 使用和对于此示例的命名空间。Use the and namespaces for this example. [!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#6)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#6)]

summary.span: 以字符串形式提供有关打印文档的信息。

span.span: Provides information about the print document, in string form.
A string.
